titleStmt.title: A declaration from his Excellencie Sir Thomas Fairfax, and the general councel of the Armie, held at Putney, Septemb. 9th. 1647.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Pounsee, at the signe of the Hand and Bible, at the lower end of Budge row, neer Dowgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
